H0.text: Who won baseball's first World Series of the 80s. Yankees

H1.text: Who won baseball's first World Series of the 80s. Dodgers

H3.text: Who won baseball's first World Series of the 80s. Phils

A4.text: The Philadelphia Phillies defeated the Kansas City Royals in six games to win the 1980 World Series.
